faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: To get started, simply install the latest version of the PagePanda CLI in your terminal by running the following command: `npm i -g @pagepanda/cli`.

faq.question: How do I build my landing page?
faq.answer: The PagePanda CLI allows you to build your landing page in just a few steps. Simply run the following command: `pagepanda build` and follow the prompts.

faq.question: Can I use the PagePanda CLI on my existing landing pages?
faq.answer: Yes, you can use the PagePanda CLI to build your landing pages. Simply run the following command: `pagepanda build` and follow the prompts.

faq.question: How do I customize the design of my landing page?
faq.answer: To customize the design of your landing page, you can modify the CSS styles in the `styles.css` file located in the `src` directory.

faq.question: Can I integrate third-party analytics tools with PagePanda?
faq.answer: Yes, you can integrate third-party analytics tools like Google Analytics or Facebook Pixel with PagePanda. Simply add the tracking code provided by the analytics service to the `head` section of your landing page.

faq.question: How can I add a contact form to my landing page?
faq.answer: To add a contact form to your landing page, you can use the built-in form component provided by PagePanda. Simply add the form component to your page template and configure the form fields and submission action.

faq.question: Is PagePanda SEO-friendly?
faq.answer: Yes, PagePanda is designed to be SEO-friendly. It generates clean HTML code, provides meta tags customization, and supports server-side rendering to ensure optimal SEO performance.

faq.question: Can I host my landing page on my own server?
faq.answer: Yes, you can host your PagePanda landing page on your own server. After building your landing page, you will get a static site that can be deployed to any hosting provider or server of your choice.

faq.question: Does PagePanda support multi-language websites?
faq.answer: Yes, PagePanda supports multi-language websites. You can easily create and manage translations for different languages using the built-in localization features.

faq.question: Can I use custom fonts in my landing page?
faq.answer: Yes, you can use custom fonts in your PagePanda landing page. Simply add the font files to your project and import them in your CSS styles.
